text:
• Sklepy i usługi: W pobliżu znajdują się supermarkety, apteki, drogerie, sklepy osiedlowe,
• Restauracje i kawiarnie: Szeroki wybór restauracji serwujących kuchnię z różnych zakątków świata, kawiarnie, piekarnie
• Edukacja: W okolicy dostępne są przedszkola, szkoły podstawowe oraz wyższe uczelnie, takie jak Uniwersytet Wrocławski
• Opieka zdrowotna: Centrum medyczne, przychodnie oraz szpitale w niedalekiej odległości
W celu umówienia wizyty pobierz aplikacje milluu (dostępną w AppStore i Google Play).
Abonament Milluu: 6% czynszu najmu + VAT/miesiąc.
English version:
Jagodno, Wrocław. It’s an ideal option for those who value comfort and quality.
Details:
• Area: 30 m²
• Layout: living room with kitchenette, bathroom, balcony
• Equipment: The apartment is fully furnished and equipped with modern household appliances (dishwasher, washing machine, refrigerator, induction hob, oven)
• Parking: Parking space in the underground garage
The apartment is in a great location with excellent access to the city center of Wrocław. The surrounding area offers a rich infrastructure that meets the needs of even the most demanding residents.
Nearby:
• Public transport: Numerous bus and tram stops providing quick access to every part of the city
• Shops and services: Supermarkets, pharmacies, drugstores, and local stores nearby
• Restaurants and cafes: A wide selection of restaurants offering cuisine from around the world, cafes, bakeries
trans:
• Stores and services: There are supermarkets, pharmacies, drug stores, and convenience stores nearby
• Restaurants and cafes: A wide selection of restaurants that serve cuisine from all over the world as well as cafes and bakeries
• Education Kindergartens, elementary schools and universities such as Wroclaw University are available nearby
• Healthcare: Medical center, clinics and hospitals in close proximity
To make an appointment, please download the milluu app (available on the AppStore and Google Play).
Milluu subscription: 6% of rent + VAT/month.
